messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the artists if they are still bound when night falls?
They rise as un-dead servants at midnight.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What time of day do the investigators must be liberated if they are to avoid becoming un-dead servants?
Midnight.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who comes to the lake to call forth Gla'aki and offer up the investigators as undying servants?
Turner and his gang.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the goal of the investigators' actions in this scene, as determined by the actions of the investigators?
To gain open and direct entry to the dig site.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What will happen if the investigators don't liberate the artists?
They will rise as un-dead servants at midnight.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is dependent on the actions of the investigators in this scene?
How this scene unfolds
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is blocking the road for the investigators?
A five bar-gate
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What sound can the investigators hear coming from the machinery?
The sound of machinery
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is standing beside a five bar-gate that blocks the road?
Richard Gibson, an undead servant from the survey team.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the sound coming from the clearing in front of the investigators?
The sound of machinery.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Richard's attitude towards the investigators if they are not hostile?
Surprisingly civil and welcoming.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of the work site where the investigators are being turned away?
Conducting blasting.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the result if they push the roll and fail?
Time is wasted, and other undead servants arrive, leading to a possible confrontation.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who takes the crystal to the surface if they succeed?
Richard
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are James Stanton, Dean Walters, and Carl White doing with the ropes and tools?
Attaching them to the crystal to pull it to the surface.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who assists them at night?
Turner and his gang
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is the site foreman that Richard will take them to?
Carl White
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the main purpose of the team at the dig site?
To recover mineral deposits in the water drainage basin
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can be found in the foreman's office?
Geological survey maps and basic laboratory equipment
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many temporary huts are there in the dig site?
Five
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of equipment is there in the woods?
Geological survey maps and basic laboratory equipment
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of the fourth hut?
To hold prisoners
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the current use of the third hut?
It is a kitchen and mess hall (not used of late).
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of the fourth hut?
It is used to hold prisoners.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What items can be found in the fifth hut?
Drilling equipment and other tools, such as dynamite.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of Carl White's office?
It is an opportunity for Carl White to be introduced to the investigators.
